title: Jacobi Asset Management Launch Europe's First Bitcoin ETF
description: Europe's inaugural Bitcoin exchange-traded fund went live today on Euronext Amsterdam, beating the U.S. to the punch.

title: RocketSwap labs suffers $865K breach; Unveils recovery plan with new farm contract
description: RocketSwap Labs found itself grappling with a significant security breach on August 14, resulting in the loss of a staggering $865,000, equivalent to 471 Ether (ETH). Acting swiftly, the company unveiled its emergency recovery plan to mitigate the breach’s aftermath. title: Cardano Struggles at $0.3, DigiToads Accelerates and Exceeds $6.9 Million

title: BREAKING: RippleNet Users UAE and India Ditch Dollar for Oil Trading — When Will XRP Transactions Explode and Send Price to $10? Report
description: India and the UAE complete a first-time crude oil transaction using their local currencies, bypassing the US dollar. This trade shift is part of a larger strategy developed in July, promoting trade in native currencies and slashing dollar-conversion costs. “History in the making!” Tweeted JackTheRippler as news broke about the groundbreaking crude oil transaction between [...]

title: Chainlink (LINK) Joins Forces with Billion-Dollar-Projects on Coinbase’s Base – Can Price Reach $20? Report
description: Coinbase’s Base blockchain has successfully integrated with Chainlink.  Link’s near-term performance was largely bullish as a result.  Chainlink, a leading decentralized blockchain oracle network, also established as the industry-standard Web3 services platform, is strengthening its reach and usability across the cryptocurrency and blockchain ecosystem. title: Trader Who Called May 2021 Bitcoin Collapse Warns of Significant BTC Correction in Coming Months
description:

Pseudonymous analyst Dave the Wave tells his 139,400 X followers that Bitcoin may collapse to the lower bound of its logarithmic growth curve (LGC) before the end of […]
